meanings.sent1: She sat squashily on the soft sofa.
meanings.sent2: The cat purred squashily as it kneaded the blanket.
meanings.sent3: The marshmallow melted squashily in the hot chocolate.
meanings.sent4: The mud squished squashily under her boots.
meanings.sent5: The jelly wobbled squashily on the plate.

meanings.sent1: The squashily pillow flattened easily when sat on.
meanings.sent2: The ripe tomato felt squashily delicate in her hand.
meanings.sent3: The cake was squashily delicious and disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: The snowman's squashily round body started to melt in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The balloon popped squashily when she squeezed it too hard.
